TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CONTEXTMENUITEM extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Defines a new menu item, submenu, or insertion point for the method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Building the shortcut menu starts at the root. Each new item goes at the end of the submenu or insertion point where you insert the item.
For more information about programming with the CONTEXTMENUITEM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
